column4: hello everyone, i just installed KDE4 on my xubuntu oniric, the anti-aliasing on the fonts has disappeared which has made the text almost unreadble :( i tried doing a sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg, but that exited without doing anything :(
i dont want to reinstall the whole thing again
tried setting it from the kde's settings manager, nothing happened
the text looks pathetically ugly right now
antialiasing on KDE or on XFCE?
you can control its antialiasing settings on systemsettings -> application appearance -> fonts
well, seems like i cant even do a sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg anymore
i type in the command, and it exists without doing anything
